mapper.select: SELECT STUDY_NO ,STUDY_NAME, STUDY_MAX_COUNT, STUDY_TYPE, TO_CHAR(STUDY_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS STUDY_DATE, STUDY_PERIOD, STUDY_MAIN_IMG FROM "STUDY" WHERE STUDY_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT STUDY_NO, MEMBER_NO FROM "STUDY_MEMBER" WHERE STUDY_CAP = 'Y'
SELECT STUDY_NO, COUNT(MEMBER_NO) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM STUDY_MEMBER GROUP BY STUDY_NO
